1356980.name: Maid of Sker Soundtrack
1356980.description: Experience the beautifully haunting and iconic soundtrack from the survival horror of the year, Maid of Sker. This soundtrack features 14 tracks composed exclusively for the game by Gareth Lumb. Featuring the re-imagining of famous Welsh hymns with the spine-chilling voice of Tia Kalmaru! Including Calon Lân (A Pure Heart), Suo-Gân (Welsh Lullaby) and Ar Hyd Y Nos (All Through the Night) - a bonus hymn that isn't included in the game.
